item.title: 世界领导人与弗朗西斯教皇的葬礼一起送葬：观看现场直播和关注更新 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 世界领导人加入送葬者弗朗西斯的葬礼：观看现场直播和关注更新＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmif0fvx3lxte91enpstzh1swoxak0wc2jjjjugf1t1m2m2mepqrfhsyvfhsyvfjtwtwtoc1nhbgllz NF4VWU4WGXOY0PGTXA1R3ZQZXVUZJHYZ1JQQV9GRNDYEKU4QWRQWRQWQZM9FVTDCWK9KEWK9KEWK5B3WK5B3JOOUUUOUOUL0SHPIEKOOUU0SHPIEKNPIEKNPIEKN5YUDWQ21SEXLNYKZWTFK？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普在教皇的葬礼上被召唤出来 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipafbvv95cuxnamjtm2jrmhc5suowbedhwvhvhptppuneybxduneybxd0djvrrnhwagrnhwagoxu3axsnd5bkr6bkr6bkr6bjnbjntbjntbtfffptfptpptpptpptptptptsse Z5b2hnaDhGanRwX0g2NmJGZDZtVVk3c2FJRElpUmhqUG9zeWE0TDFJUFpWRUh5RHUwcFotRDJ0YVpSMmJhaGJoU1M3SW04bU8tQ2dLQmg0R2ZMN0MtRHBobUI4eEJGd211SQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>哈里斯堡主教参加了教皇的葬礼之后的经验href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmigafbvv95cuxnb0c4c4c4vtzfcjhyueiyq3r3r3ynlvs3npuflemzfppznrpr19oawvhn2dyvk 15TZCWZMLOAFDETVLSSHNUWUS0A0ZVWJQ1R0ZQWJRYMEJ3DUSZYWPTC3Z2V0DUYVM5ZFHKATRYM25KBB0VB0VOUDB0VOUDBWVUDBWVURFYJL1TMJL1TMJOS3RQMEDEOA？ target =“ _ blank”>照片：教皇方济各的最后旅程＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 教皇的坟墓是由他的意大利祖父母土地制成的＆nbsp; nbsp; 梵蒂冈新闻

item.title: 在为在教皇葬礼上建造桥梁的请求中，特朗普有一个关于俄罗斯的启示
item.description: 在请求在教皇葬礼上建造桥梁的请求，特朗普有一个启示 - 关于俄罗斯＆nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiy0fvx3lxte9it1fqrhvosjdrmlrhcju3dfbualpzt0k2ah O3Z1A0BKHHZWNIQW8XQKJHAMXHELPTQKNJCKNJCKNWT1P1XZRWYZLMVEJXB29KR3BTALDXMEI2BMPXMPXMNLPZGDYALRTZW？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普实时更新：有关俄罗斯-ukraine，教育和更多的最新新闻href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxtfbunhctcghbmwvbbgfppzzrsaezooxk2 bnytctlkawgysl9gmvnpyufmwm9kclhjzexiqkkzsu5zre82njlimffnee9ftzvjy0m0zzvjy0m0zzbtefbtefbivxzczczw？ target =“ _ blank”>在图片教皇的葬礼上谁是：特朗普，马克龙，威廉王子等href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxnu0jpevlmzgxhednia3blqvfvs29jymd4jymd4skjem0lhlhlhluhhiuhhrmk40shjkk40shjkym1lnnepcy WF6WELOB2ZXQWTIMFZWN0POD2ZICTNHZG1LT05XBDJFSNQXRGLIULJXQUL0WMDJATDYODDLUM5YA0PGWDLLVDLLVDLLVDLLVDLLVDLLVDLLVDLLVDLLVDHY2HYZFE2WNLFWNLFWNLFWFPFPFPFPFPFBNK5HPSVRLMJC？ target =“ _ blank”>从Zelensky到Melania，在特朗普在教皇的葬礼上的出现＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxOWVAxUnczSGY0bTYyN1dDRjR5X1FqS1lCZUpxN0k0ZEk4S0o2eFRUYmNWb2lDT0hubDBtcXJDdnVvUU5RLV vhsf9vtehszxpmuzcwsgfxous1ytnja0hgsf9nm0r4x3fdwwwttq0nxnljsb0xpc2jlb0lxu 1E3DTTBUDWJPEWJTTLHOBVZKC0I3OFJURF9KN05VYMY1B2HSDMJLR3DPB0CXQVJVJVZW？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>前美国驻俄罗斯大使在特朗普 - 泽伦斯基会议上

item.title: 俄罗斯声称，它已经重新控制了乌克兰 - 英国广播公司的库尔斯克
item.description: 俄罗斯声称，它已从乌克兰重新控制了库尔斯克＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 俄罗斯声称已在其库尔斯克地区重演了最后的村庄＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilafbvv95cuxod1vhy0nhy0nhylfqavm5r1d0uhpjd1yyzlbzod btegjdunriwkhvq1ppy2m0n3l4zhjwejutsg9qbluwa21wbtkzetlhzfp5nmlvmdhzbjhfrjhfrjutq09imexowggltclp6rfd Bz2Z1M1NXCJKXCVVOZ1PUTUFFRGXOAHDORMF1BLRPS2RBQ1VDAWDPPSUPJA1J00GFWQVVFFFFFMTW1XU3H2RWH2RWXQQQQBWN0CVZJ axfmzzlrnwlkylq5akvkwur0bjzabkh6u3plc0vnwhkwd0hpdglrnjbzuwk4agutagkxrul4m29lt0w3eexqz0e？oc = 5英寸Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯证实朝鲜部队在乌克兰，声称库尔斯克地区被重新占领＆nbsp; nbsp; href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimwfbvv95cuxqwnltcevxbut4alczdkzdkzdkzntdrwyvpvy0vpvy0vpquc0euooooooooooo5agxqt0agxqt0rymgdimznqmwxgefgg5dflqnkv5 ZGdpQWlBZGZuenpmcEdTYVZ6a1hXeWIyd29tQzNBaEpQOVRoUkZxMC0tSkR6azJybV9EZzRiSkw4eHNOTmZuZEM3SEszVmFsZGNLeXBiajJkVkJYYXZ6cWMyZm82Yw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>普京说，库尔斯克退回，将军承认部署朝鲜部队＆nbsp; nbsp; newweek href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihwfbvv95cuxpws0zwxvpt3rtmexaohrrrnznhs0dpd3dinuhtrdbqme5 fnmr6snp5nnhiajjjwoe5daxl0whrpd1fxtwn4yxlzb2mzqmxfy3vwcfflytfknerosfknerosfntwwwzvmefntwwwzvmef4rxf4rxflddhymhvvququhzvequhzvhjhzmzmzmziw lzmqm9uyu0yte1us2ltcdn3vvxsax5bvv95cuxqskloq1q1ujb5tldvd0licxrztnvqvjjexttbhhng5jlwnnnmujkneznmujknez1cvltctjalul dbjb0s09wb2vhbfzqemvcwdbmuhdzqkrhazzqeduxsmhyzjnfd05jtuc4ytb2mev5uzh3sjjjjnsuhrduxjauhrduxjau qnduxjauq4qnddhgsfe oc = 5 Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯要求重新捕获库尔斯克边境地区，但乌克兰说战斗继续＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn

item.title: 伊朗港口的大规模爆炸炸死14人，数百人受伤-CNN
item.description: 伊朗港口的大规模爆炸杀死14，造成数百人 ＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 伊朗港口的巨大爆炸杀死8人，造成750 ＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 巨大的伊朗港口爆炸至少14次杀死数百人 ＆nbsp; 纽约时报 新闻包装：伊朗港口，由巨大的，致命的爆炸＆nbsp;＆nbsp; pbs

item.title: 俄罗斯说，与杀死俄罗斯将军的汽车爆炸有关的“乌克兰特种服务代理”被拘留-CNN
item.description: 俄罗斯说'乌克兰特种服务代理商'被拘留在杀死俄罗斯将军的汽车爆炸有关href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte1st0i2evl3axriv2hrbnrotjhtdunf sll1rljzwmxfsg5jd2rvnxbiu3hrsk1valzjaxh6vzfsys1qdur2ur2aglonlotbge1a3rhmzvwyzfhekludw？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯在汽车炸弹袭击中拘留了嫌疑人，该袭击杀死了一般＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 俄罗斯高级将军在莫斯科附近的汽车爆炸中丧生＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《纽约时报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxpukd4ynj2vwloszbfs1zcsjhpc3d0d1q2edbsybbfs1q2edbsy1fzty04nerzsdhjyw VKQ0FSYUHNSFDNNZRZY3LWU2NVQVLXMU5FRHDHBGGXA1LONDDXYUD0BKDVCNNIN3C5YKNVRUXZVRUXZV0JABHFVVVRDZFVRDZFDKLTRMFIEKPFIEKPFIEKPFBFBTJLDDFRUFFRUJLRM5 3Z19yumptvfh2Agxsazybqvvfexfmt2lwnwxhbnc5vnr1ngv1uhhjy1nxrzg3tffzmgwwmw80tzhbelc2rign tzhbelc2r teprzmf3afu3wg5ry2zkmjbftwq0vjq5swottwlasxbsewpldu5sdxzzswtmytxzqx2ptnhdwz0trvjrsnklnklnewlhbhbhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh qtjjjguxb5c0plyb5c0plyb5c0plypllwnr？ target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯 - 乌克兰战争：关键事件清单，第1,157天＆nbsp;＆nbsp; al Jazeera 莫斯科炸弹上的特朗普总统杀死了俄罗斯将军＆nbsp; nbsp; c-span

item.title: 美国和伊朗总结了最新的核谈判，在关键问题上分歧-WSJ
item.description: 美国。伊朗总结了最新的核谈判，在关键问题上进行了划分＆nbsp; wsj 伊朗和美国在阿曼举行的专家谈判时间 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxPUTlzdHhpWWFJZEhXSzZ3dnNPaUJhanFIVk5HQzJVVVp3YXk4a3pMemJ6TlJiRlVTejJWTnpoSjgtSTJTdTRlbGU0 ZVC2DMZXQ256T09ESHHPX0DJAVPVBGXFAHLQZ00ZRUPZSXBNNTF0NXDQMEH6DGZDVGN1N1Q5MN vizmvbwjjnmei0rwpusewtwfvnbdbdnmkxmm9zy09lzup3y3g0rhntuk5omgpbqnzmtq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>伊朗对与我们的核谈判的成功表示''极为谨慎' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmieefvx3lxtfb0ejvrmzvnt3hunme5edixtlfccxbebuj5zerowhhhrunbimm1z yvjpa0nxmgp2wer4szr0av9lc0x5otjxcddwexhmwfg3evlobmdsrrzwo1ymlsqxhxre9gohfwsre9gohfwwswsv6zdzdzdzdzdzdzdzdzdzdzdzjdud2efd22 andhdxi3zg？oc = 5 target =“ _ blank”>美国。在与伊朗的第三轮核谈判中说“进一步进展” href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihwfbvv95cuxonhhhgtdvhqkdjv0plute2rmnsbvfite82vvvvvvrd0jkqutjrujkqutjruu9o9o9oqzzzzlprzl XZ1NUN3hTcTZCbkMwckVaQTVDZDB5TlZvVUY0UmV2b0ZIZkx6Mmt0RWIxazhrUjl5cGlfc0hvS01rbWx5QlczV1ZhM2JRMEYyOGdVcVVxdGxOYTQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>伊朗和美国进行有关德黑兰核计划的技术谈判＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》
